author: dnikolop
body:
A few minor changes to the code like:
- Use of dictionary for seconds retrieved per event
- Change of print order
- Tidy up the code
- Replaced get_max and get_min with python max, min

@ktf 
Result to the output is the same apart the print order and print of a headline. Does not affect cmsPerfStripCharts.py. Let me know if you want to have different plots Also here.
title: Minor code modifications
